summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Nob Hill Avenue, from Prospect Street to Highland Drive, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and constructing cement sidewalks, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 36413; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
